channel.title: Compile.bat not running my server, only running Testscape
channel.description:
Well, I fixed everything and got my Testscape account back (Mod_Kaine, which I made after I thought Testscape was MY server I made :P)
Unfortunately I lost 80% of the T-trail rune and d-armour I got. Oh well.
Now I'm trying to get my server up and running
- Opened Hamachi, made a new network
[i]Hamachi Login Name: KaineScape Password: kainescaperules[/i]
- Ran Compile.bat - It ran Testscape (maybe because it's in the Testscape source folder...)
What do I do to make it run MY server instead of Testscape?
I also need help with Aryan commands.
I've found ::mod <0 = Player, 1 = Player mod, 2 = Jagex mod> ::emote <insert number> Most of the numbers you put in will make your char glitch out.
I wanna know if there are any J-MOD and P-MOD-only commands that Jagex themselves use when they're in the game.

item.title: Compile.bat not running my server, only running Testscape
item.dc:creator: @ImmortalKaine ImmortalKaine
item.description:
@ImmortalKaine wrote:

I copied and paste the Testscape folder and changed the folder name to KaineScape and then ran Hamachi and the compiler (from the KaineScape folder) and it still said Testscape.

What am I doing wrong?

Read full topic
item.source: Compile.bat not running my server, only running Testscape

item.title: Compile.bat not running my server, only running Testscape
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

::emote doesn’t make your character ‘glitch out’, the most likely case is that you were using an emote ID that only NPCs usually use;

And to make it do your server, put the batch file in the same folder that your server is.

I know that Jagex uses the NPC commands, as well as ::noclip, then on RS everyone is like “WHAT THE FUCKING SHIT HOW ARE YOU AN NPC?@?@#?@#? OMGWTFBBQ”, poor idiots who know nothing about clients or servers …

Read full topic
item.source: Compile.bat not running my server, only running Testscape
